overview:
Chief Operating Officer at MrChewy.com

As Chief Operating Officer, Alan oversees the entire operation of MrChewy.com to ensure that all processes run smoothly and efficiently, while continuing to yield success and grow. Alan is responsible for the planning and implementation of all business and marketing strategies, as well as ensuring that all brand, image and voice elements are in line with the overall company vision.

Along with an incredible passion for pets, Alan brings more than 15 years experience in sales, branding, design, marketing, business analysis and strategy, customer relations and management to MrChewy.com. His career in agency design and branding has involved him in hundreds of projects revolving around building brands, creating intuitive websites, managing complex application development projects and solving marketing problems for clients across many different B2B and B2C markets.

Alan is a true entrepreneur with an unwavering can-do attitude and incredible ability to get just about anything done. Heâ€™s MrChewy.comâ€™s go-to-guy for everything.

He lives in Miami with his wife and his troop of 4 rescued cats and dogs. As the oldest on the team, he is jokingly referred to as â€˜Dad.â€™

Specialties

  • Brand Building, UI & Design
  • Online and Offline Marketing
  • Business Analysis and Strategy
  • Web Development
  • Ecommerce
